7 Trevor Thompson

Position Shortstop

Weight 205

Class Senior

Hometown Lake Hopatcong, N.J.

Highschool Jefferson Township

Major Athletic Training

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2017: Named First Team All-Conference... Named to E8 All Tournament team...On February 26th, went 2-for-4 with a double an RBI at Virginia Wesleyan... Went 5-for-6 with three doubles, one RBI, and one run scored on March 16th at Whittier... On March 18th, went 2-for-4 with an RBI and two runs scored at Occidental... Recorded three hits with two RBI, two doubles, and two runs scored on April 8th at Elmira... In the second game of a double header at SUNY Canton went 2-for-5 with one homerun, two RBI, and two runs scored on April 14th... In a three game series vs. Utica from April 29th to April 30th went 6-for-13 with 7 RBI, two doubles, one homerun, and two stolen bases...On May 3rd went two for four with a homerun, a triple, two RBI and three runs scored against St. Lawrence...Collected two hits in four at bats with an RBI and a run scored against Castleton... | 2017 game-by-game statistics

2016: Named to the Collegiate Baseball News Preseason watch list for 2016… Started in 41 games… Named Empire 8 Conference Second Team… Landed on D3baseball.com Team of the Week on May 9th… Empire 8 Player of the Week on May 9th… In the first game of the season he went 3-for-5 with two runs scored and two RBI at Susquehanna on Feb. 27th … Recorded two hits, two RBI, and scored one run in the first game of a double header against Whittier College on March 16th … Had a six game hitting streak from March 22nd to April 3rd… On April 10th in the second game of a double header drove in two runs and scored two runs on 2-for-4 hitting against Canton … On April 11th against Canton went 2-for-3 with two RBI, two runs scored, and one walk … Went 4-for-5 with two RBI, one run scored, and a triple at Rochester on April 12th … In a matchup against New Paltz on April 19th recorded one hit with two walks, one stolen base, one RBI, and three runs scored … On April 24th against Houghton went 2-for-4 with two hits and one run scored … Went 2-for-4 recording one double, one RBI, and one run scored on April 20th at St. John Fisher in the first game of a double header … Hit his fourth homerun of the season while going 1-for-4 with 2 RBI and one run scored on May 4th against St. Lawrence … Went 3-for-5 with a home run, double, three runs scored and three RBI at St. John Fisher on May 8th. | 2016 game-by-game statistics

2015: First Team Empire 8 All-Conference… ABCA/Rawlings First Team All-New York Region… Led the team in seven offensive categories… Won Empire 8 Player of the Week the week of March 16th after hitting .440 during Ithaca’s spring break trip to California including four multi-hit games. He had a total of 11 hits in seven games with four runs, four RBI, four walks, two doubles, and a triple… Recorded a three-run homerun in the second game of a double header against Utica on April 18th… Tallied two doubles against St. John Fisher on April 25th… Recorded three hits, scored two runs and started a ninth inning rally to beat Oswego State on April 28th… Had a hit in 30 of 34 games… Had both a 10 and a 12 game hitting streak during the season. | 2015 game-by-game statistics

2014: Thompson hit .316 during his freshman campaign on 12 hits in 38 at bats. He scored five runs, drove in five more and hit a homerun against New Paltz on Apr. 26. | 2014 game-by-game statistics

High School: A 2013 graduate of Jefferson Township High School, Thompson was coached by Jason Kalish. In 2013, he was named New Jersey Herald first team all-county, a captain and was selected as the team's Most Valuable Player.

Personal: An athletic training major, he is the son of James and Katrina Thompson.
